quotes.quote: Do not worry if you have built your castles in the air. They are where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift. That’s why it’s called the present
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: How am I going to live today in order to create the tomorrow I'm committed to?
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: I’ve learned that people willforget what you said,people will forget what you did, but people will never forget how you made them feel
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
quotes.author: George Patton

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I–I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the diference
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: What would you do if you weren't afraid?
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily; even if you had no title or position
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Larry Elder

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw of the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of life has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others
quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

quotes.quote: All the forces in the world are not so powerful as an idea whose time has come.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Anyone can hold the helm when the sea is calm
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached; it often serves simply as something to aim at.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours
quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

quotes.quote: Goals are dreams with deadlines.
quotes.author: Diana Scharf Hunt

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I cannot give you the formula for success, but I can give you the formula for failure, which is: Try to please everybody.
quotes.author: Herbert Swope

quotes.quote: I recommend to you to take care of the minutes; for hours will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: If you’re offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It is better to have lived one day as a tiger than a thousand years as a sheep.
quotes.author: Tibetan saying

quotes.quote: It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: My interest in life comes from setting myself huge, apparently unachievable challenges and trying to rise above them.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Lead me, follow me, or get out of my way
quotes.author: General George Patton

quotes.quote: Money is a wonderful thing, but it is possible to pay too high a price for it.
quotes.author: Alexander Bloch

quotes.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going!
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Not the cry, but the flight of a wild duck, leads the flock to fly and follow.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Take care of the minutes and the hours will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The greatest dreams are always unrealistic.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Where there is no vision, the people perish.
quotes.author: Proverbs 29:18

quotes.quote: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You become what you believe.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, concerned citizens can change world. Indeed it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Neither success nor failure are ever final.
quotes.author: Roger Babson

quotes.quote: You are not defined by your past. You are prepared by your past.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We tend to forget that happiness doesn't come as a result of getting something we don't have, but rather recognizing and appreciating what we do have.
quotes.author: Friedrich Koenig

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Seek opportunity, not security. A boat in a harbor is safe, but in time its bottom will rot out.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
